oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Current perspectives on drug and chemical residue problems from FDA's Center for Veterinary Medicine
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Teske, Richard H.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: cattle diseases
Chemicals
Drug residues
Drug therapy
Drugs
Somatotropin
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: There is considerable focus on increasing the cooperation and communication between agencies at the Federal, State and local levels. As this becomes more of a reality it will become increasingly difficult for individuals with a history of producing animals, milk or eggs with violative residues to find markets that will accept them. Paper presented at the 22nd AABP Convention, Kansas City, MO., Nov. 14-17, 1989
